ai-vv68:0.4_0: The First Seking for the going forth
ai-vv68:1.1_0: “Like the moon on a cloudless night,
ai-vv68:1.3_0: In just the same way, all of you,
ai-vv68:2.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv68:3.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv68:3.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv68:4.2_0: Knowing this perfected one, the perfected one;
ai-vv68:5.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv68:6.1_0: The fourth, which is the fourth, knowing the fourth,
